question: Last week I had several episodes of heavy chest pressure after walking (had to stop). At my dr.'s appt yesterday she did an EKG which showed a HR of 56. She now wants me to consult a heart specialist for a stress test,etc. I am a 54 yr.female with Type2 diabetes, medically controlled high blood pressure, and sleep apnea ( can't stand the CPAP). Slightly overweight, don't exercise enough, and now am terrified. Any thoughts? Or similar situations?
title: Sinus bradycardia
